message: Let's start with a fair split, Bob. Your turn!
I'll give you 40, but you can give me more
Meet me in the middle, Bob. Your turn!
I'll give you a bit less, but still a fair split
Get closer to my target, Bob. Your turn!
I'll give you a bit more, but I'm not giving up yet!
Getting closer to my target, Bob. Last chance to meet me!
